Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: for example: James helped me improve the DPoW code, so it automatically generates some things that used to require a very painful manual entering of data (all 64 notary addresses that correspond to their pubkeys). HUSH and EMC2 have this, and when CHIPS + GAME do their yearly hardfork to upgrade notaries, they can easily pull in that change, which makes maintaining the external coin that adds DPoW much easier
